charges.charge_description: 18:1343.F Fraud by Wire, Radio, OR Television (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term of Eight (8) Months. The Defendant Shall Surrender For Service of Sentence at The Institution Designated by The Bureau of Prison S Before Noon on 03/06/98 or as Notified by The United States Marshal. Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of Three (3) Years. The Defendant Shall Make Restitution in The Amount of $4,143.58. S Chedule of Payments. Statement of Reasons.

charges.charge_description: 18:1343.F Fraud by Wire, Radio, OR Television (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term of Eight (8) Months. The Defendant Shall Surrender For Service of Sentence at The Institution Designated by The Bureau of Prison S Before Noon on 03/06/98 or as Notified by The Unites States Marshal. Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of Three (3) Years. The Defendant Shall Make Restitution in The Amount of $4,143.58. S Chedule of Payments. Statement of Reasons.
